restore_snapshot_modal.title: Restore Snapshot
restore_snapshot_modal.description: When proceeding, your snapshot will be restored.
restore_snapshot_modal.confirmation_text: Please enter the name of your server ({serverName}) to confirm snapshot restore.
restore_snapshot_modal.confirmation_description: By clicking on "Restore Snapshot" we'll restore your snapshot.
restore_snapshot_modal.please_power_off: Please power off your server before proceeding
